page.title: 13CLUBS & GROUPS IN REDBOURN
page.content: { }Redbourn is an active village with over 40 different clubs,groups and societies ranging from brownie and cub groups to several care groups for the elderly or ill. The busiest care group is the { {REDBOURN CARE GROUP }which takes people to hospital if they are ill or elderly. They will also talk to people if they have a problem. The{REDBOURN CARE GROUP}is not the only important care group. There is also the {REDBOURN HOSPICE GROUP}which will help people if they are terminally ill.The{REDBOURN HOSPICE {GROUP }will carry on caring for the family until they are old enough to live on their own. The are many different clubs,groups and societies for children such as brownies,cubs and youth clubs.
